sentences.en: " I suppose my memory is getting faulty.
sentences.cn: " 我看我的记忆力出问题了.

sentences.en: a faulty gene that causes breast cancer
sentences.cn: 引起乳腺癌的一种缺陷基因

sentences.en: an idea based on a faulty understanding of biology
sentences.cn: 建立在对生物学错误认识之上的一个观点

sentences.en: Ask for a refund if the goods are faulty.
sentences.cn: 商品如有缺陷，可要求退款。

sentences.en: Customers may ask for a refund if the goods are faulty.
sentences.cn: 商品有问题的话，顾客可以要求退货。

sentences.en: Everybody bought some just because the goods were cheap; but they turned out to be faulty — they say fools rush in.
sentences.cn: 只是因为东西便宜,每个人都买了一些, 结果发现东西都是坏的——他们说傻瓜总是胆大妄为.

sentences.en: Is the vendor always held responsible if goods are faulty?
sentences.cn: 如果产品有瑕疵,卖主是否一定要负责到底?

sentences.en: Our holiday photos didn't come out, eg because the film was faulty.
sentences.cn: 我们假日的照片冲洗不出来(如因胶卷有毛病).

sentences.en: Perhaps anger had clouded his vision, perhaps his judgment had been faulty.
sentences.cn: 可能是愤怒蒙蔽了他的眼睛，也可能是他判断有误。

sentences.en: The faulty left-hand engine failed catastrophically as the aircraft approached the airport.
sentences.cn: 飞机快到机场时，本来有故障的左引擎突然熄火，引发了灾难。

sentences.en: The feed - pipe is as clean as a whistle, so I'm afraid, if the oil is not getting through to the burner, the valve must be faulty.
sentences.cn: 送料管干干净净, 所以我担心要是油不通过喷嘴, 阀门一定有毛病.

sentences.en: The gauge must be giving a faulty reading.
The indeterminateness is due not to faulty experimental technique.
sentences.cn: 不确定并不是由于实验技术的不完备.

sentences.en: The money will be used to repair faulty equipment.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱将用来修理出故障的设备。

sentences.en: Their interpretation was faulty — they had misinterpreted things.
sentences.cn: 他们的理解是错误的——他们将事情曲解了。

sentences.en: There is a faulty connection in the fusebox.
This faulty connection is the source of the engine trouble.
sentences.cn: 这种错误的连接法是引擎出毛病的原因.

words.tran_cn: 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误
[地质] 断层作用；断层错动；故障
（通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔

trans.tran_en: not working properly, or not made correctly
